title: Poro King: Rioters VS NA Players. Friday, Dec 18th @5PM PST.
body:
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/IdQXAvqh3a0/maxresdefault.jpg

Ok. Let's do this. :) We're up for some Poro King games this Friday, who's in? The Featured Game Modes team is down, I'm calling out any other royal Rioters as well! Last time we ran 3 games due to lots of Rioters, same deal again this time around if we get plenty.

FOR THE KING! >o</

**What:** Legend of the Poro King
**When:** Friday, Dec 18th @ 5PM PST.
**Where:** NA server. Room details and password will be edited into this thread on Fri.

---------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------
**Game 1: FULL**
**Room:** Riot VS Players 4 THE KING #1
**PWD:** 4theking
**Rioters:** L4T3NCY, BuffMePlz, Riot Default, ManWolfAxeBoss, Riot Stephiroth

**Game 2: FULL**
**Room:** Riot VS Players 4 THE KING #2
**PWD:** 4theking
**Rioters:** RiotVitzkrieg, RiotPheonix, Riot Ve1vet, Jynx, Ponts

**Game 3: FULL**
**Room:** Riot VS Players 4 THE KING #3
**PWD:** 4theking2
**Rioters:** L4T3NCY, BuffMePlz, Riot Default, ManWolfAxeBoss, Riot Stephiroth

**Game 4: **
**Room:** Riot VS Players 4 THE KING #4
**PWD:** 4theking2
**Rioters:** RiotVitzkrieg, RiotPheonix, Riot Ve1vet, Jynx, Ponts


-----------------------------------------------

GG! Thanks for playing guys. :D Well done to the BEASTMODE game. The poro COMPELS YOU TO GO IN!

replies.body:
Too late.

(I finally got to make a name joke)

They did get crushed... QQ
It was an honor o7

As was it for me
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
ManWolf
This guy. . .
I am down, ban lux!

> [{quoted}](name=SoundChaosDebug,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Nk72E6cu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-17T00:11:49.722+0000)
>
> I am down, ban lux!

Don't forget Jayce, Varus, Karma, Ziggs and Twisted Fate.

People who use Underworld Twisted Fate are a special breed of evil
When playing against L4T3NCY, you should always ban Alistar, Malzahar, Fizz... :D
If you are on L4T3NCY's team, do him a huge favour and pick Bard, he will thank you for it I promise.

What the hell, you still exist? Since you're titled "Featured Game Mode Designer", I'm guessing you dropped the whole AI thingie and someone's taken the torch (since I strongly believe that small changes are happening somewhat frequently)? Oh well, glad to see you nonetheless.
Lol yes I still exist.  I've been working on game modes for 2+ years now, since before we launched the feature with the initial One For All back in 2013. =P

is best Bard. Couldn't make it to show the glory though =(
Rioters shall fall to the might of NA this time.
You'll never take me down! >:c
We shall see, muhahahaha

Gonna try and make it, if I do, prepare to see the joy known as AD LEONA!
PRAISE THE SUN!
http://img09.deviantart.net/78c9/i/2014/331/4/f/praising_it_by_4rca-d87u70k.png

And I missed them again.

Though at least this time is my fault. I was checking the red tracker, not this page.
You'll find the lobbies in the Custom "Legend of the Poro King"  but you'll have to wait since they already started.
THIS SOUNDS SO FUN!!!!  How do I join?!
do you have to be lvl 30 to join?

I like to pretend these things are like lottery scams where the winner is some predetermined actor and you actually have no chance of getting in, but the reality is much closer to me reading the thread and forgetting to check back.
It makes me feel like I'm not missing out.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
FOR THE KING!

Legend of the Tuesday Teamfights but Three Hours Later on Thursday
Sounds fun

I don't know. I'll get dominated by Riot. For me, it's like playing against God, like he's already beaten you before the game even starts. But it sounds fun to not only play with but also interact with the people behind the scenes of one of the greatest online mobas ever made. Believe me. Long time ago, a youtuber named Angry Joe put this as one of the top ten games of a certain year. I think it was the year Dominion was released.
I would love to join in on this, but I don't think I'll have access to good enough internet during that time period...

It's awesome that the devs are hosting behind-the-scenes events like these, while still working on their part of the game.

Also, if I feed enough times with Swain, will Riot think he's weak and buff him?

I'll be doing christmas stuff. 

But I'll gift a mystery skin for the man who calls out and defeats Unconkable. 

Be my sword, to pay him back for countess games of hurricane rush teemo top and the misery I had to endure playing with that on my team. I ain't even hating, but it was awful conk. Why would you do that to your friends. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
http://lizapalmer.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/aragorn.jpg
Ahh ready to show off my mad blitz plays to the devs >:)
Sounds like a fun time
